Title: Famous words of Mao Zedong: The world is yours, but it's also ours; in the last analysis, however, it's yours
Designer: International Editorial Office of New China Photography Section of New China News Agency (新华通讯社新华摄影部国际编辑室)Hou Bo (侯波)
Notes: The photograph, taken by Hou Bo, shows Mao Zedong with teachers and students of the Shaoshan School in 1959.
